summary: WIPERS STOPPED WORKING WHILE DRIVING IN THUNDERSTORM ON JULY 1, 2016. I PAYED FOR REPAIRS $474, IN  2016.  CAR RECALLED FOR SAME 2017.  RECALL ID NUMBER 16V582.  GM SAID I WOULD BE REIMBURSED IF ALREADY FIXED.  TOOK TO DEALER AS INSTRUCTED, BUT GM ONLY REIMBURSED FOR PART  $148 ( WAS I TO INSTALL IT MYSELF ?) . SAID BILL IN WRONG NAME, BUT IN  HUSBAND NAME  AS NOTED.  THEY DECLINED OTHER DOCUMENTATION. SAID PART NUMBER WRONG; I HAD NO CONTROL OVER PART NUMBER, JUST NEEDED WIPERS TO WORK.   I AM STILL OUT OVER $300.  HOW CAN   GM  CLAIM  THEY ARE REIMBURSING?
